input: i guess the finality of my decision and the financial repercussions have me feeling doubtful
i feel like i did the last time i had to break up with a lousy boyfriend in so im out of practice like junk
i could better understand and feel the desires of his most sweet heart
i feel this place was tragic
i feel respected something most girls cannot receive from their peers
i am not feeling fabulous i can now speak
i don t feel greedy of worldly things so it s not a big deal
i didnt want to hurt her feelings and am fond of avoiding conflict when these situations arise
i will not feel so alone anymore
i even feel that he is still feel gloomy and moody till now
once i was caught by thugs aged between
i feel tortured when i hear them talk or sing or laugh or cry
i had finally had enough of feeling defeated by myself
i feel for the natives who welcomed me and others with open arms and hearts back then and wonder how they cope
i feel like i am losing confidence but for now i feel calm
